dict.acceptation: 屋顶，房屋；最高部，顶部；最高限度；口腔顶部；

sent.orig: Four pillars supported the roof of the chapel which was lit an opening in the roof.
sent.trans: 小教堂的屋顶是由四根柱子支撑，光线则是经由开启的天窗摄射入。

sent.orig: Roof runoff water quality was affected by rainfall, rainfall intensity, roof material, season and air temperature.
sent.trans: 屋面径流水质主要受降雨量、降雨强度、屋面材料、季节和气温的影响。

sent.orig: Pagoda Roof selections are no longer available when the Auto-Roof option is enabled.
sent.trans: 自动盖房顶的选项如果启用，塔形房顶的选择就不再可用。

sent.orig: Secondly, discretion formula of roof destruction is obtained by simplifying roof strata to elastic thin board.
sent.trans: 其次将分段开采后顶板岩层简化为四边固支的弹性薄板，得出了顶板破断的判别式。

sent.orig: The roof slice longwall method increases the work of laying false roof for next slice.
sent.trans: 长壁采煤法的采煤工艺具有多重特点：顶分层采煤增加了要为下分层填设假顶的工作。
